== Mangalawad (602845) ==
      
Mangalawad is a village in the [[Haliyal ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 308.16 hectares and harbouring 748 households with total population of 3455 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[HALIYAL]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 1715 and female population is 1740. Scheduled Caste Population is 177 and Scheduled Tribes population is 79. Census Location Code of the village is 602845<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
